translationBlock.key: Writes the length of the string to the byte array, as a short, (interpreted as UTF-8), then writes the UTF-8 string itself. If an external application requires the string to be serialized in a different manner, then use the string-byte_array conversion methods in StringHandling, however strings written in this manner are compatible with ba_get_string. The encoding may be set, but defaults to UTF-8.
